name: SURViVE (itch) (AI-0)
description:
SURViVE as long as you can in an Expanding Room filled with Infinitely Generated Attacks!

This Game was made for the Text Only Jam 2.

Controls
  • ← → - Navigate Menus and Move I.
  • X - Choose Menu Options and Levitate.
  • C - Hook.
  • F11 - Toggle Fullscreen.
